name: Miami Cuban Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: All of the sabor that you love from a Cuban sandwich, packed into our big-game-ready Miami Cuban Dip. Hollow out a bread bowl. Stuff it with real-deal ingredients, like pickles, Swiss cheese and ham, then bring it home with McCormick® Pork Gravy for a taste of Little Havana that will last through overtime.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups shredded Swiss cheese, divided
5 tablespoons dill pickles, coarsely chopped, divided
1 cup deli-sliced roast pork cut into bite-size pieces
directions: Cut an oval on top of bread and remove bread center to make room for the dip
Tear removed bread top and bread center into bite-size pieces
Whisk milk gradually into gravy mix in medium saucepan
Stirring frequently, cook over medium heat until gravy comes to a boil
Stir in 1 1/4 cups of the cheese, 4 tablespoons of the pickles, mayonnaise, and mustard
Cook 2 to 3 minutes or until cheese is melted
Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bread is warm
Sprinkle dip with remaining 1 tablespoon chopped pickles
